      • Player

        public Player(int loan,
              int bills,
              java.lang.String icon)
        Constructor

        Postcondition: Sets the loan, bills and the pawn of the player and initializes the amount each player is getting from the start.

        Parameters:
        loan - The loan of the player.
        bills - The bills the player needs to pay.
        icon - The icon of the pawn.
